battleUpdates.title: Combat System Overhaul
battleUpdates.summary: Revolutionary improvements to the core combat mechanics
changes: Added new combo system with 15 unique combinations
detailedChanges: Added new combo system with 15 unique combinations
Enhanced particle effects for better visual feedback
Fixed collision detection issues with armored enemies
New parry system with perfect timing rewards
battleUpdates.developerNotes: This update represents our biggest combat improvement yet. We've completely rewritten the hit detection system and added a sophisticated combo system that rewards skill and timing.

battleUpdates.title: Performance Optimization
battleUpdates.summary: Significant performance improvements across all platforms
changes: Improved frame rate stability on mobile devices
detailedChanges: Improved frame rate stability on mobile devices
Fixed memory leak in weapon switching system
Enhanced texture compression for faster loading
Improved shader performance on older devices
battleUpdates.developerNotes: Performance is crucial for smooth combat. These optimizations ensure that every player gets the best possible experience regardless of their device.

chronicles.title: The Legendary Combo Master
chronicles.story: Achieved a 50-hit combo streak against the final boss using only the basic dagger. The timing was perfect, and every hit connected flawlessly. The boss didn't stand a chance!

chronicles.title: The Great Escape
chronicles.story: Survived for 15 minutes in the survival mode with only 1 HP remaining. Used every trick in the book - dodging, blocking, and strategic positioning. The tension was incredible!

chronicles.title: The Unlucky Warrior
chronicles.story: Accidentally fell off the arena 5 times in a row during the same battle. My character became a meme in our gaming group. Sometimes the best stories are the funny failures!

chronicles.title: The Perfect Run
chronicles.story: Completed the entire campaign in under 45 minutes with no deaths. The new weapon upgrades made it possible to achieve this incredible time. New world record!
